Class Card

Constructor Detail

Card

public Card(Lesson lesson,
            Teacher teacher,
            int cardId,
            Section s,
            StateFullSchedule state,
            java.lang.String info,
            java.lang.String mod)
The only constructor for a card. It will build a card with all it'll need.

Parameters:
lesson - the Lesson represented on the card
teacher - the Teacher represented on the card
cardId - an unique Id for the card
s - Section represented on the card
state - the main state, where all the model data can be accessed
info - will tell if it's a computer class or not
mod - the type of card (classe, groupe, ect)
Method Detail

resetStatusCard

public void resetStatusCard()
will reset the card, i.e. will put it back in the selection panel

setTimePeriod_and_pickARoom

public boolean setTimePeriod_and_pickARoom(int timePeriod)
Set the card TimePeriod and pick a convenient classRoom In other words, this method place the card.

Parameters:
timePeriod - the time period to set the card
Returns:
if the method went well, if the card is placed

setTimePeriod_and_Room

public void setTimePeriod_and_Room(int timePeriod,
                                   Room selectedRoom)
will also place the card, but with a specified classRoom

Parameters:
timePeriod - the timePeriod to place the card
selectedRoom - the room to place the card at
